author: abergman2017
title: Good Place to stay close to broadway and time square - Review
text: This was a good place to stay. Quiet, clean nice staff. Rooms were spacious for New York. Breakfast was good. It was a great location to get to Broadway and Time Square. Close to Empire State building and subway stops.
